about_the_game:
Welcome to Willowmist, a charming, sleepy town nestled in the mountains—a place where people who don’t quite fit in finally belong. Beneath its quiet, sleepy exterior lies many a resident bound by secrets... will you be the one to uncover their stories?

In this cozy supernatural narrative shop simulator, you’ve been entrusted with running your aunt’s beloved antique store while she’s away for three months.

Step into the role of shopkeeper and take charge of The Willowmist Emporium of Antiques & Curiosities. Price unique items, haggle with customers, and manage your inventory to keep the business afloat. 

Build meaningful connections with the townsfolk, including 5 unique love interests and a host of side characters. As you help the residents of Willowmist uncover their truths and confront their secrets, you may just discover something of your own: a sense of belonging and a place to finally call home.

Work your part-time job. Go home to your tiny apartment. Sleep. Rinse and repeat. That's how life is supposed to be, right?

You're Sage (renameable), 26 years old and stuck in a cycle that feels like it will never end. The city is suffocating, your job is uninspiring, and everyone around you seems to have their life together—except you.

A letter will change everything.

Your eccentric, estranged Aunt Sylvie writes to you from Willowmist, a sleepy, out-of-the-way town that barely shows up on a map, asking for a favor. She has to leave for a while—no explanation, of course—and she wants you to take care of her greatest treasure: her antique store.

As you settle into your new life, you’ll build relationships, sell antiques, and maybe even fall in love—all while discovering that this place, this store, and maybe even you… are far more extraordinary than you ever imagined.

  • Create Your Character: Choose between two character bases for Sage (renameable) and select their pronouns.

  • Buy, Sell, Haggle: Keep the store stocked with unique antiques and decide how to price them.

  • Upgrade Your Shop: Level up your store to gain more skills and attract more customers! A fun skill-tree allows improving everything—from scaring away the competition at auctions to improving your haggling skills.

  • Dice Rolls and Stats: Decisions and actions aren’t always straightforward—your success depends on your stats and a touch of luck.

  • Eventful Days: Every day brings new opportunities, events, and unexpected challenges, from cleaning mishaps to unusual customers. Plan out your day—run the store, clean, upgrade antiques, run errands, attend auctions and much more!

  • Discover the Mysteries of Willowmist: Everyone in this town has secrets—that's why they come to Willowmist! Get to know the locals through chains of events that unlock as you play the game. Every playthrough is different!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+ / SteamOS 3.0+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-4300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 1 GB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 6450)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 (Big Sur) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / Apple M1 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-compatible GPU with at least 1 GB VRAM (e.g., Intel Iris Plus Graphics 645 or better)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) / Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU with at least 1 GB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A cozy narrative shop sim where you move to the sleepy town of Willowmist to run your aunt’s antique store. Meet 5 charming love interests and quirky locals—each with secrets to uncover—in a town where nothing is quite as it seems. Buy, sell, and haggle to keep the store afloat!
